an10.39:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an10.39:1.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, sangho bhinno hoti”ti?
an10.39:1.4: “Idhananda, bhikkhu adhammam dhammoti dipenti, dhammam adhammoti dipenti, avinayam vinayoti dipenti …pe…
an10.39:1.6: Te imehi dasahi vatthuhi avakassanti apakassanti aveni kammani karonti aveni patimokkham uddisanti.
an10.39:1.7: Ettavata kho, ananda, sangho bhinno hoti”ti.
an10.39:2.1: “Samaggam pana, bhante, sangham bhinditva kim so pasavati”ti?
